reviews.review_text: This certification completely transformed my practice. I was struggling to transition from general wellness coaching to Default, and this course gave me the exact framework I needed. The assessment framework module alone was worth the investment. Now I have 11 new clients and finally feel confident in my niche.

This certification completely transformed my practice. I was struggling to transition from fitness training to Default, and this course gave me the exact framework I needed. The assessment framework module alone was worth the investment. Now I have 3 new clients and finally feel confident in my niche.

I've taken 8 courses in this field, but this one stands out. The practical focus on session structure helped me pivot my entire business model. Within 6 weeks I had filled my calendar. The community support was incredible too.

Good certification with practical tools, though some modules felt repetitive. The session planner was excellent, but the business side could use expansion. Worth it if you're new to default, but experienced practitioners might find some sections basic.

Good certification with practical tools, though some modules felt repetitive. The progress tracker was excellent, but the business side could use expansion. Worth it if you're new to default, but experienced practitioners might find some sections basic.

Best professional investment I've made in years. The clear explanations made complex topics accessible, and I immediately applied session planner with my first client post-certification. Revenue up 119% in 6 weeks. Worth every penny.
The business-building modules were pure gold. Implemented the consultation funnel and saw 127% revenue increase in 2 months. Finally feel like a legitimate professional in the default space.
The business-building modules were pure gold. Implemented the consultation funnel and saw 87% revenue increase in 3 months. Finally feel like a legitimate professional in the default space.

The depth of research behind this curriculum is impressive. Every claim backed by academic sources, which builds massive credibility with clients. The progress measure has become my go-to for intake sessions. Thoroughly evidence-based.

Best professional investment I've made in years. The real-world examples made complex topics accessible, and I immediately applied goal-setting framework with my first client post-certification. Revenue up 82% in 90 days. Worth every penny.

Finally, a certification that respects your intelligence. The research foundation section gave me the conceptual foundation I was missing from my previous training. Now I can confidently explain behavioral change to clients and colleagues.

Skeptical about the price initially, but the client handouts templates alone saved me 12 hours of work. Closed 13 new clients in 2 months using the pitch framework from the ethics module. Already made back 2x my investment.

I've taken 8 courses in this field, but this one stands out. The practical focus on client acquisition helped me pivot my entire business model. Within 90 days I had doubled my rates. The community support was incredible too.

Best professional investment I've made in years. The clear explanations made complex topics accessible, and I immediately applied goal-setting framework with my first client post-certification. Revenue up 59% in 90 days. Worth every penny.

This certification completely transformed my practice. I was struggling to transition from corporate HR to Default, and this course gave me the exact framework I needed. The advanced protocols module alone was worth the investment. Now I have 12 new clients and finally feel confident in my niche.

Best professional investment I've made in years. The practical focus made complex topics accessible, and I immediately applied intake assessment with my first client post-certification. Revenue up 79% in 2 months. Worth every penny.

Solid content overall, but I wish there was more on insurance billing. The the ethics module module felt rushed compared to others. Still valuable, just expected more depth given the price point. Would recommend, but set expectations accordingly.
ROI was insane. Paid for itself in 2 weeks after I landed my first {niche_client_type} client using the client journey map from Module 6. Now charging $321 per session vs $57 before. Game changer.
Loved the role-play scenarios. Being able to discuss ethical dilemmas with peers who 'get it' was invaluable. The script library is something I still reference all the time. Great ongoing value.
